messages.content: The original is funnier... or at least it's funny, to begin with.
I'm laughing because this exact thing happened to me.

It’s funny because this is the summary of most discussion posts on this sub
Omg yes lol it’s the story of my life
I feel like this is just a really old meme lol
Lol for real tho. But hey, we’re a football, soccer, and tennis school now

Hahaha so I’m no longer going to worry about it then lol
It's 2019 and people are *still* saying "SJW's?" Ha! Hahahahaha! Oh my life. [NAME].
Bahahahahaha the life of a fish parent!
My bio is pretty funny... I got ‘If you’re a Catfish then you’ll be charged a call out fee of £120.49’
I said this somewhere else.. but I swear that man in the hood is caucasian... But that was actually hilarious

well we all know what a complex meal sandwiches are! hahaha

ha ha LOL guys aren't we so QuIrKyyyy

I'm legit posting this everywhere. It's hilarious. I've given you many chances.

i did, but it was at 3 am before i went to bed, so i’m gonna cheat and count it as 2018 LOL.
